resources.string: Enter the following code on the Google sign-in page:
It is recommend that you do not use the same Google account that is used to play Pokémon GO. We accept no responsibility if your PoGo account happens to get suspended from using this. Be careful.
Sign in using the Pokémon Trainer Club.
Authenticate with a Google device code
If you need to reset your authentication credentials and return to the first-run setup screen, use the option below.
You are required to authenticate via PTC or Google to use this app. You do not need to use the same credentials you use for Pokemon GO.
If you are unable to find any Pokémon, you may have not accepted the ToS yet.
